contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.qandaqu.QAndAQuestionPageContent:
Hello, 
I have created on page using widgets only. now i want to implement the global search functionality using azure ai search. so wanted to know how i can implement with widget data. Because i am not able to find any link that describes whether particular widget belongs or not. So what should be my indexing strategy. 
When user search from home for some article content that is been rendered using widgets i want to display the list of pages that content s that content
***
**Environment**
* Xperience by Kentico version: \[30.3.1]
* .NET version: \[8]
* Execution environment: \[SaaS|Private cloud (Azure/AWS/Virtual machine)]
* Link to relevant [Xperience by Kentico documentation](https://docs.kentico.com)
